title: Polestar 2 gets Android Automotive 11, its third major Android version
content:
The first electric vehicle to go on sale with Android Automotive is getting another major update, as Polestar 2 is rolling out its Android 11 update.

moreâ€¦

The post Polestar 2 gets Android Automotive 11, its third major Android version appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Polestar 2 owners are getting an update to Android 11 for the Android Automotive EVs, the third major update made available to date.
